description: Get Your Questions Answered: BetaSource FAQ Has Got You Covered.

queanslist.question: How can BetaSource help with Cost Optimization?
queanslist.answer: Our team will analyze your infrastructure and recommend cost-saving strategies, such as rightsizing, reserved instances, and usage analysis.

queanslist.question: How long does the Cloud Assessment take?
queanslist.answer: The Cloud Assessment typically takes between two to four weeks, depending on the complexity of your infrastructure.

queanslist.question: Will the Cloud Assessment affect my infrastructure?
queanslist.answer: No, the Cloud Assessment will not affect your infrastructure in any way. Our team will use read-only access to analyze your infrastructure and will not make any changes to your resources.

queanslist.question: What type of cloud infrastructures does BetaSource support?
queanslist.answer: BetaSource supports all major cloud infrastructures, including Amazon Web Services (AWS), Microsoft Azure, and Google Cloud Platform.

queanslist.question: What if I have questions or need help with the Cloud Assessment?
queanslist.answer: Our team is always available to answer any questions you may have during the Cloud Assessment process.
